author: rcmatthews
msg: Revised the process of laying out so that the available space is taken into consideration, this reduces the workload and ensures that scroll borders are only given space when they need to be shown.

author: rcmatthews
msg: removed the clearing of object's field during  a destroy.  It is up to the application developer to deal with mechanics of object destruction

author: rcmatthews
msg: Added Java2Html jar to lib so that ant can always find it; especially after a checkout.
